casebody.data:
Thursday, May 22, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

97-728. Cleveland Police Patrolmen’s Assn. v. Cleveland.

Cuyahoga App. No. 70380. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellee’s motion to vacate April 30, 1997 entry and strike motion for stay or, in the alternative, motion for sanctions,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion be, and hereby is, denied.

Lundberg Stratton, J., concurs, but would grant seven days to respond and would then have this court reconsider the stay.
